title: The ASUS 8Z has finally made its way to Indian shores almost a year after its international debut
content:
A few months after unveiling the ZenFone 8, ASUS confirmed that it planned on bringing its compact flagship to the Indian market. However, after making the announcement in July last year, ASUS went AWOL, leading many fans to believe that the company had skipped the Indian market altogether. But that’s not the case. Today, the

The post The ASUS 8Z has finally made its way to Indian shores almost a year after its international debut appeared first on xda-developers.
description: ASUS has finally launched its compact flagship, the ASUS 8Z, in the Indian market. Read on to learn more about the device.
